title: Polearm Master
content:
only do Polearm Clout (the Bonus Action attack) once per turn, even if you have two Bonus Actions from being a Thief. Polearm Clout will appear on your hotbar after attacking on your turn, and will disappear as soon as you use it. Attacking a second time with Extra Attack will not bring the Polearm Clout action back to your hotbar.
